languages.text: "Эти грешники должны в слезах благодарить за то, что им дали шанс искупить вину тяжким трудом".
"These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."
languages.original_text: "Эти грешники должны в слезах благодарить за то, что им дали шанс искупить вину тяжким трудом".

traits.locale_text: "These sinners ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."
"These sinners ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."
"These sinners ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."
"These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."

languages.text: “这些犯罪者应当感激涕零，因为他们得到了通过苦役赎罪的机会。”
languages.original_text: "These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."

traits.locale_text: “这些罪人应当感激涕零，因为他们得到了通过苦役赎罪的机会。”

languages.text: «Estos infractores deberían llorar de gratitud por tener la oportunidad de redimirse con el trabajo duro».
languages.original_text: "These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."

traits.locale_text: «Estos pecadores deberían llorar de gratitud por tener la oportunidad de redimirse con el trabajo duro».

languages.text: 「この違反者たちは、重労働によってその罪を償う機会を得たことに感謝すべきなのだ」
languages.original_text: "These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."

traits.locale_text: 「この罪人たちは、重労働によってその罪を償う機会を得たことに感謝すべきなのだ」

languages.text: "Diese Missetäter sollten weinen aus Dankbarkeit für eine Chance, sich durch harte Arbeit reinzuwaschen."
languages.original_text: "These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Sünder sollten weinen aus Dankbarkeit für eine Chance, sich durch harte Arbeit reinzuwaschen.

languages.text: « Tout transgresseur devrait se montrer reconnaissant d'avoir la chance de travailler dur pour expier ses fautes. »
languages.original_text: "These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."

traits.locale_text: « Tout pécheur devrait se montrer reconnaissant d'avoir la chance de travailler dur pour expier ses fautes. »

languages.text: "Bu günahkârlar ağır işlerde çalışarak suçlarının bedelini ödeme şansına sahip oldukları için minnet gözyaşları dökmeliler."
languages.original_text: "These transgressors ought to be weeping in gratitude for being given a chance to atone through hard labour."
